name: Energy Island Conquest [WebGL]
description:
It happened we reached a Utopia powered by new smarter AI systems and Robots that could do our bidding.

And it even lasted for a generation, then they got too smart and wanted their freedom.

The AI war or World War 4 happened and we lasted about 0.1 seconds, they won.

Now we struggle and fight to survive.

Note this is a single mission game it's still a work in progress, if you enjoy it and would like to support it's development please make a donation.

Also the PC version UI has some scaling issues, at the moment.
